When I bought this game, I only intended it to be used to enhance GMod, as GMod has less errors with CSS. However, I eventually gave it a go and fell in love with it. CSS is an FPS that runs of the Source engine, one of the best engines out there if not the best. The game differs from generic first person shooters like Call for Money in two ways. One: you don't actually own any gun 24/7 exept for 2 pistols, one for each team. You have a certain amount of money that you get from tasks like getting kills/assists and rescuing hostages in hostage mode. You use this money at the start of the round to buy guns, grenades, kevlar, and a few other accesories. You only have these for the round, so you have to ration this money. Sometimes, it's best to not buy anything or buy extremely cheap items, and then take a better weapon from a fallen enemy or ally. The second main difference is that, on most servers, there are no respawns exept for when another round starts. However, this leads to a major drawback. Even though there are tons of unique and awesome gamemodes like hostage or control points, 90% of rounds end as if the gamemode was arena(fight until one team is all dead). Still the game is fun nonetheless. The money system, great mods, and a bearable community makes this game great.

Counter Strike é, sem dúvida, um clássico dos FPS. CS:S explora é um jogo de tiro em primeira pessoa que explora muito a skill e a estratégia, assim como o antigo CS 1.6. 
Com graficos bem melhores que seu antecessor, devido a engine Source, é uma ótima opção de FPS.
Mas gostaria de ver os FPS da Valve com a mecânica de puxar mira como o BF4, COD, etc. Com a qualidade dos jogos atuais não dá pra admitir um personagem atirando sem mirar e com a arma na altura da cintura.
Recomendo este jogo devido a sua engine ser muito boa e ao fato de ele ser muito focado na skill e na estratégia.
one of the best games ive ever played..miss the old days of playin this everyday

Amazing! By far my most played game on steam. This game is the reason why I have steam today. One of the best first person shooters I have ever played. There's so much more to this game than just rounds and rounds of hostage rescue or bomb defusing. You can play gun games, surf, fight zombies, play on rpg servers, play jail break, etc...The possibilities are practically endless. 10/10 would definitely recommend!

Aahhhhh.... Counter-Strike ! Quel nostalgie !
C'est un très très bon jeu de tir à la première personne, toute la série reste excellent, que ce soir le 1.6, le CZ, le source ou le GO.
Les fans de CallOfDuty ou de Battlefield, passez votre chemin.
Ce jeu a un gameplay très différent de ces jeux, et il faut connaitre des techniques pour bien progresser et commencer à jouer contre des bots faciles si on débute dans ce jeu, sinon vous allez traiter les joueurs de cheateurs ! (C'est incoyable comment ils sont des professionnels dans ce jeu).
Bref, je vous le recommande, et mieux encore, achetez le pack complet de Counter-Strike !
